settings.title:
Alkaline Water equals enhanced hydration.
Create it on the go.
How does it work?
settings.text: The magnesium, tourmaline, silica and zinc inside your bottle’s VitaBead Diffuser is what alkalizes your water.
settings.video_embed: <iframe src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/V3WX3SoOULI?controls=0&rel=0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen="" width="800" height="450" frameborder="0"></iframe>

settings.title: Kickstart your metabolism
settings.content: You’ll feel more energetic. Right from your first bottle in the morning. And you’ll carry that (and your DYLN bottle) with you the whole day.

settings.title: Hydrate more efficiently
settings.content: Alkaline water is more easily absorbed by the body. So, you can drink less water. (But you won’t want to.)

settings.title: Recover faster
settings.content: Increases blood flow. So you get more oxygen to your muscles. And you can push harder at the gym.

settings.title: Combat acid reflux
settings.content: Drink enough Alkaline water and you may experience what some of our customers have. A reduction (or complete elimination) of acid reflux symptoms.

settings.title: Why is alkaline water better for you?
Superior water.
settings.content:
The replaceable VitaBead Diffuser quickly delivers alkaline & antioxidant water.

One VitaBead Diffuser & One Removal Tool are included with each DYLN Bottle.

300 liters of Alkaline Water until you have to replace your VitaBead Diffuser.

settings.title: Superior design.
settings.content:
Ergonomic design made to fit perfectly in your hand

316 Surgical-grade stainless steel interior. Built to last a lifetime.

3 layered insulation to keep your water cold for up to 24 hrs.
settings.bottom: Check out the DYLN Insulated Bottle’s tech specs here

settings.title: Alkaline water is good for you.
settings.content: The water tastes clean and crispy. It makes me drink 8 glasses of water a day and keeps me hydrated all day long.
settings.author: Malou A.

settings.title: Don’t read this review!!

settings.author: Robert P.

settings.title: Love this bottle
settings.content: I love the size of this bottle! I drink a ton of water everyday and this holds a lot but I can still carry it because of the handle. Love that it’s good for me too! Very well made!
settings.author: Naomi M.

settings.title: Part of my daily life
settings.content: The build is excellent and the larger size boosts my hydration during long rehearsals and performances. And it stays cool!
settings.author: Nathan W.

settings.title: We love it
settings.content: A friend of mine recommended alkaline water for my acid reflux. I look for something that I can bring with me where I go. DYLN fits all my needs. I don't use plastic bottles anymore. I don't need to buy alkaline water by case.
settings.author: Imelda A.

settings.title: Love it
settings.content: I was spending several dollars per day on bottled Alkaline water so this is a huge savings.
settings.author: Matthew B.

settings.step_title: Inside the Diffuser Removal Tool travel pouch, you can find the Diffuser already attached to the end of the tool.

settings.illustration_content: Detach the Diffuser from the tool, then rinse it under warm water for about 20 seconds.
Soak the Diffuser completely submerged in a glass of warm water for about 20 minutes.
Removing the Diffuser from the glass, repeat Step 2 and shake any excess water out.
Let the Diffuser sit out overnight (or at least 8 hours) so the VitaBeads can air-dry completely.
While the Diffuser is soaking and air-drying, wash out your bottle and cap with water and soap. Be sure to rinse out all of the soap. *Not dishwasher safe.
Attach the middle piece of your tool so the tool can reach the bottom of the bottle.

Attach the Diffuser to the tool by fitting the upside down L-shaped grooves on the tool over the two bumps on the top side of the Diffuser, then twist slightly to lock together.
*Be sure the Diffuser is the right way up. The top side has two bumps near the edge, and the bottom side has four tabs near the edge.
Using the Tool, insert the Diffuser into the bottle to align with the Diffuser holder at the bottom of the bottle. Push down to click the Diffuser into the holder.
Unlock the Tool by lightly twisting counterclockwise, and pull straight up to release the Tool from the Diffuser.

settings.recommendation_content: Quality pH test drops are a quick and easy way to test the pH of water.
pH strips are intended and designed for measuring urine and saliva, not water or alkaline water.
Using a calibrated pH test meter will provide the most precise results.
This method will not give accurate or reliable results, because it is limited to an approximate pH range of 6.0—8.0.

Patents

Various products, as noted below, are covered by one or more United States patents. This webpage has been provided to facilitate notice of these patents to the public pursuant to Title 35 United States Code Section 287(a).

The listing below is provided in good faith and is believed to be accurate. However, only a few of our patents are noted below and the failure of a product to appear on this webpage does not mean that it is not covered by a patent we own or control.

DYLN Living Water Bottle

settings.title: Thousands already know the difference Alkaline Water makes.
settings.btn_text: Why is Alkaline Water so important?

settings.title: Why is Alkaline Water important?
settings.content:
The modern diet is broken.

It’s littered with fast food, soft drinks, and all the processed junk you could ever want. It’s difficult to get what your body really needs.

Alkaline water can help.

Like fruits and vegetables, alkaline water is full of antioxidants. It can reduce inflammation and aid digestion. Just with a sip of water.

settings.title:
The best water.
Inside the best bottle.
settings.content:
Every bottle comes with the patented VitaBead Diffuser, so you can start drinking Alkaline water right away.

Bottle features

  • Ergonomic bottle design for comfortable carrying
  • Double-walled vacuum insulation to keep your water cold for up to 24 hours.
  • 316 Surgical-grade stainless steel interior. Built to last a lifetime.
  • Includes a tool to easily attach and remove diffusers
  • Plastic-free and BPA-free (of course)
